meta.content: Brady Public Schools is a CommonSense Certified: Digital Citizenship School

div.style: height: auto;background-image: url("/uploads/3/7/1/5/37158669/background-images/1874190572.jpg") ;background-repeat: no-repeat ;background-position: undefined undefined ;background-size: 100% ;background-color: transparent ;background-size: cover;

br.font: Brady Public Schools will provide educational services through distance learning for the remainder of the 2019-20 School Year. We will have a formal checkout with a schedule to follow at a later date. The 2019-20 Calendar will be followed for closures. Assignments will continue to be recorded and be part of a student’s academic record. Commencement for the Class of 2020 will be moved to July 18th at 4:00 pending the lifting of gatherings due to COVID-19 Virus. Continue to check the school’s website for information @ www.bradyschools.org. ​
